reviewText: This product was purchased by me to introduce my young daughter to the fairy tales that I grew up with and she loves it! I used to watch the series on tv when I was young and I hope Hallmark will release the rest of the series.

This is well worth the money I use to watch this when I was small.  I had them on VHS and now I have them on DVD.  The quality is great and the delivery was fast and realiable.  Would reccomend to any parent
Great condition and great product. I was so excited when it arrived. I think I watched it more than my kids did. It also arrived on time and was still sealed as new. Highly recommend.
I purchased this DVD for my children ages 3 to 6 and they love it!  This was a great buy!
I had these stories on vhs as a child and I loved them, I'm so glad I found them on dvd. I get to enjoy them now anytime I want. I only hope the rest of the movies in the collection come out on dvd.
Got this for my granddaughter and she really loves it.  Very sweet timeless tales - well done!
Olivia Newton-John introduces these fairy tales. The animations are nicely told and I recommend these for small children and of course Olivia fans.
Excellent DVD and stories for all generations.
Awe brings me back to my childhood, love these movies
They edited out Olivia Newton-John's ending!!!
Gave to my friend children as a gift. They love it !
I had all of the timeless tales as a child and watched them all of the time, they were my favorite. Well, now they suck. Ah well, my son loved them.
Amazing!!! Watched these movies growing up and I only hope the make the others into a DVD as well. Would highly recommend it.

I ordered this set because I used to watch timeless tales as a young child and it was so cheap. My toddler wasn't really into them but I can't give a bad rating just because of that. They are older animations but nice to have for keepsake

This product was purchased by me to introduce my young daughter to the fairy tales that I grew up with and she loves it! I used to watch the series on tv when I was young and I hope Hallmark will release the rest of the series.
I remember watching this when I was a REALLY little girl. I loved the stories and the animation. This was really nostalgic for me.
My grandchildren and i like the movies very much and hope to  order more in the further.  Thanks very much.
Decent movies but I would not purchase them again.  I did not like the animation quality.
I used to watch this when I was a kid.. Bought it for my daughter, she loves it! I hope all the other volumes get released soon!
The stories were boring.
Had this as a child and bought it for my own daughter.
Loved it!
I love this! I had it as a girl and now my girl can watch them! I wish they'd come out with the rest of them on DVD!
I love seeing my girls get into these 3 like I did when I was a child. Thank you!
I been looking for these for so long. My toddler loves them.  I was trying to get the Ugly Duckling but no luck! Wish they had this too.
LOOOVE THIS MOVIE, ITS SERIOUSLY MY CHILDHOOD BROUGHT BACK TO ME!! THANK YOU!! THE QUALITY IS PERFECT!!
Very pleased with my purchase! Thank you!  :)
